title: Mystery Teachings
overview: Learn the history, the symbolism, and the meaning of the 22 archetypes.Theresa Bullard, Ph.D., is a pioneer in the field of fusing modern science, consciousness, and ancient transformative teachings. She obtained her Ph.D. in Physics from the University of Washington and has become an advanced initiate, Teacher, Healer, and Guide within the lineage of King Salomon. Throughout her journey, Dr. Bullard has worked to weave together her formal education with her deep training in the western mystery school lineage. This has given her a life-long path of embracing the gifts of both Science and Spirituality.
